description: These three amigos are goofing around, playing some pool, and having a relaxed, good time with each other.  DJ's not the greatest shot in the world, so when he takes aim at the 8 ball, TommyD sees an opportunity to capitalize.  DJ agrees to take both Tommy's AND Christian Wilde's cocks in his ass at the same time if he misses the shot.  Faced with the pressure, DJ chokes and totally blows it.  That's not the only thing he ends up blowing!Christian and Tommy can't wait to collect on the wager, so they tackle DJ to the floor.  Tommy slides his dick right into DJ's waiting mouth while Christian works DJ's dick into a throbbing frenzy.  After they stuff him deep with a double penetration, DJ admits to missing the pocket on purpose!  He wanted his pocket filled instead.                                                                                          Enjoy!
title: The Opportunity Taker
